website_summaries.verdict: Simply set the end of this car tablet holder into your least-used cup holder, and your adaptable swivel-arm of a car tablet holder will be good to go.
pros: Effortlessly stands in your cup holder
Convenient 10 inch swing arm makes it easy to position a tablet exactly where you need it
cons: Although it is the easiest car tablet holder to install, it makes for one less place to store your Slurpee

customer_reviews.title: So I will be looking for a better mounting bracket that fits around my iPad case
customer_reviews.text: The product seems to be well built, and arrived promptly. It came with two attachments, 1 for phone, the other for iPad or tablet. My only fault is with the iPad holder..... Most iPads have protective covers on them to protect them from drops, and scratches, and cracked screens. So do mine. And unfortunately, the mount for the iPad, does not protrude far enough to go around my iPad cover and secure it in place. And I will not pull the cover off every time I have to put it in the truck. So I will be looking for a better mounting bracket that fits around my iPad case
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stable.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, It is a really good stand. I though it will not be stable with my ipad mini, but it stand really would. It could rotate to all angle vertically and horizontally. Build with high quality material. You cannot go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: Vu

customer_reviews.title: Kinda flimsy with heavier devices
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this stand does it's job. It's very versatile to fit almost any device. It held a full size iPad without a problem. The cup holder feature is very nice as well. You can secure it to any cup holder with just a couple of twists on the adjustment handle. The single downside is the actual stand (the pole) isn't sturdy enough to hold the weight of the iPad without swaying back and forth while braking and accelerating. Fix that problem, and it's a keeper and a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee

customer_reviews.title: Good product but check the size of your cup holders first.
customer_reviews.text: The device may not fit all vehicles. In my Toyota Highlander the cup holders are 4" wide and the iKross cup is much more narrow , even fully stretched. I had to improvise with another layer of foam, socks, etc to make the fit snug. Once it fits the iPad holder is pretty firm but you end up looking at it slightly sideways to the right. This may not matter for some purposes but for GPS and navigation it is better to have something closer to the straight line of vision so you get distracted less glancing at the screen while driving.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Dabski

customer_reviews.title: Superb Cup Mount That's Versatile and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cup mount for my girlfriend and she loves, loves, loves it. It holds practically any and all devices you can think of and the versatility of it is amazing. And that adjustable base allows it to fit snugly in every cars cup holder we've tried it in from small compacts like Honda's to large trucks/SUV's with no problems at all. And that cool swivel arm allows you to adjust the height and angle of whatever device it's holding to give you complete control and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: piercing elf

customer_reviews.title: Works great on iPad mini, too small for 9.7” iPad.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use iPad Air2 with Peloton app on stationary bike. The bike has a cup holder, so I figured it would be perfect. Description just mentions tablets in general, nothing specific. I have a 9.7” IPad and the device was far too small for use on it, even with the case removed. I was able to use my older IPad mini and it fit just fine and allowed me to ride without having to hold the device. Would recommend for a phone or tablet, no larger than an iPad mini. Unit arrived on time and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: S.Russell

customer_reviews.title: Will not work in some coffee cup holders.
customer_reviews.text: Here's the problem: You can't be all things to all people. I followed the instructions to the letter. However when tightening the device in the cup holder, I noticed that the fit was not solid and it popped loose quite easily rendering it useless. Fortunately, because it was a prime item, I have been able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph E. Outcalt Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Cupholder mount is a GREAT idea! 2-in-1 makes it a FANTASTIC and useful bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our 2016 Ford Supercrew. I am really impressed that this gives you a mount for the phone AND a mount for tablets. On road trips, the passenger gets to watch movies on the Fire HD 10! For everyday driving, the smart phone has a hands free home! Several people have "noticed" this and commented how nice it looks. One person insisted that I send the link for it so they cold order one. Great price, made well and should last many years for us. I recommend this highly.
customer_reviews.author: Davio

customer_reviews.title: Very Well-Built Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-built product - better than some others I've used at three times the price. It's easy to set up, is very sturdy, holds my tablet and smartphone very securely, doesn't wobble, and is easy to adjust in all sorts of positions. The only drawback is that I had to use a small piece of neoprene rubber to get it to grip the cupholder well because of the notch between cupholders in my 2017 Ford Escape. If your cupholders have a notch between them you can use virtually any kind of foam or rubber to cover the notch.
customer_reviews.author: Echelon

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Sturdy and has Multiple Uses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend, he is very happy with it. I could see the sturdiness of it the moment he opened it, also the flexibility. It opens up enough to hold a 10.1 in tablet in cinema mode or a any size phone in Portrait mode, fits perfectly in his cup holder where it can stay or lift out to be used like an extension to lift your device above your head while shooting a video. I was tempted to keep it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Alternative Addiction Rock Affliction

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product cant wait to test it on a roadtrip
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product cant wait to test it on a roadtrip. I bought this and was nervous it wouldnt fit my ipad mini 4 with a otter box defender case on it but it fits great. The swivel that holds the devices seems to have a strong locking mechanism that you can adjust to whatever angle you want. I havnt tested this in the car yet but the product seems sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, But Flimsy Construction Kills The Deal
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time ordering this item. I received mine today and once I tested it in my SUV with my IPod it was immediately obvious that the flimsy construction of this holder will make it impossible for my IPod to be secure driving down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Kimo

customer_reviews.title: works great on the prius prime
customer_reviews.text: The product fits nicely in the cup holder and is easy to remove if you want. I needed this for longer trips when the phone needs to be charged via the 12v. The prius prime comes with a qi wireless charger built into the console. But it charges slowly - so on long distance drives I wanted something I could put the phone in and connect to the 12V. I'm always running waze when driving - and this always me to power the phone and run it on those longer drives. Vent mounts do not really work in the prime.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Car Mount!!
customer_reviews.text: This mount is sensational. Works really well for a tablet and holds sturdy. Does not bounce around during driving and with bumps. Very happy with this purchase. However, this is not good for all cars. I have a GMC Acadia and it worked perfect. But, my wife has a Lexus GX460 and the mount gets in the way of the shift stick. I gave it 5 stars because that is not iKross fault. The car manufacturers should start accounting for all types of mounts when designing their cars or offer mounts built in. Great purchase. I have been looking for a good mount for a long time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rick L.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my SUV
customer_reviews.text: The stand is the perfect addition to my SUV. Flexibility options for the device is a plus for me. The Color matches the interior of my vehicle, so it blends well astetically. Functionally: with the exception of one issue (I really like the functionality design). Easy to install in the cup holder. Once you determine which direction to place your phone, the adjustable arm is easy to lock in place and the phone holder is secure. Con: my one concern is related to adding instructions for placing your device on the stand. Other than that, great product. Going to purchase one for my mom, so she stops looking for her phone when driving (smiling).
customer_reviews.author: Duval Girl

customer_reviews.title: nice holder for IPHONE 7 and 9
customer_reviews.text: nice holder for IPHONE 7 and 9.7 inch IPAD. Snugs into drink holder nicely. And easy to transfer between my car and my truck. Adjustable clamp holds phone and IPAD in place nicely. No real issue except for the room it takes up. But happy with the unit and using it on long trips with IPAD for navigation. Would recommend it to others for use with phones and small tablets.
customer_reviews.author: R. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid holder. But will it fit your car?
customer_reviews.text: Holds an iPhone with an add-on battery pack snugly. Clamps firmly in the drink holder. Angle adjustment is solid. Really a good product. One thing you need to ask about before buying --- Is there enough space around the cup holder in my car to fit this? For example, my car: The holders are between the shifter and the armrest, and it definitely intrudes a bit. Still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: This product is a poorly designed competitor to the unit sold by Weather Tech! The quality and over designed components are totally out of the demands of a balanced device to fit in an awkward position that is often subjected to lots of torque!
customer_reviews.author: Irby Simpkins

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest Vehicle iPad Holder Out There!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic holder. I've tried a couple of windshield mounted holders but none of them seem to work well and my iPad has dropped a couple of times. I decided to try this one out and I'm glad I did. The device is very sturdy and quite adjustable. I use it to hold my older iPad 2 for navigation purposes while driving and it's fantastic. Very well built. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for a great holder for their iPad. 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: A. Etchechury

customer_reviews.title: Bought one to try, then bought 24 more
customer_reviews.text: Our safety dept. wanted our staff to have a way to safely secure their iPads where they could see them (for the GPS) while driving. After some research, we decided to try these, and immediately got glowing feedback from our staff. We ended up ordering 24 more. One arrived broken, but the seller approved a full refund immediately. We ordered a replacement, which had no issues. Highly recommend these car mounts!
customer_reviews.author: B. Stiner

customer_reviews.title: Handy Phone and Tablet Holder
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice to have a product that will hold both an iPad and an iPhone even when they are enclosed in a case. It is easy to assemble and fits well in the car cup holder. My only slight reservation is that the little plastic lever used to remove the tablet or phone from the base seems a little flimsy and I worry that it might snap off with wear. But overall I am really pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: TALL AND SET MOUNT
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice mount. It it tall and helps elevate my phone into a better view for driving. However, the angles are set at certain degrees. It's not horrible but not fully adjustable as one might wish. Comes with Tablet/Phone interchangeable holders. The phone ones are not as easy to put in and out but not a deal breaker. Still a decent phone holder.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Table holders
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our work trucks, we are a portable toilet company and we drive all day on all kinds of roads and these holds hold our tablets right were we need them. we have bought 5 and if we need more we will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Amandas honey pots

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This tablet/cell phone holder is so awesome, that I just had to buy a second one for my wife. We have been very please with durability and functionality of this product. I really don't have anything bad to say about this. My only suggestion for improvement would be a telescoping arm to raise and lower the positioning. The arm does swivel up and down for a higher or lower positioning. But something something in between might be desirable. I would still purchase again and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: this really would work if....
customer_reviews.text: if it has a ball head so angeling was better and if there was a way to take the phone or tablet off and on easier leaving the holder there in tact for the next driver would be best. and maybe a third arm so the tilt factor was available. bulky and didnt move as well as I would have liked it too. it is solid and I have to give it 5 stars just on that point but getting the phone off and on was a challenge even for me. so that got a 1star.
customer_reviews.author: Janet's  personal opnion

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE A  PENNY ON THIS ONE
customer_reviews.text: Pure junk. This thing doesn't fit the cup holder well at all. It has a twist mechanism that expands the base to fit the holder it is not stable. Hard to manage arm to extend phone. iphone does NOT fit in phone holder. Back this thing goes.
customer_reviews.author: Leah M.  Camara

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice Mount
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice mount for my Ipad Pro 9.7. Recently took it on a trip and used it for almost 8 hours and it worked great. I now have to purchase a Bluetooth GPS so I can use it for navigation as the Ipad is not very exact with your location if you get away from wifi signals. But the mount worked well. It could be a little more robust at the junction between the Ipad mound and the stand, but so far it has held up. I may buy another for the other vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R.

customer_reviews.title: Broken from the factory as the box was sealed.
customer_reviews.text: I hate it because the item arrived sealed but was damaged. The piece that locks the tablet arm in place was bent over and would not latch the arm. This is a sign of a lack of a quality assurance program. Plus there is no exchange program and now I have to wait until I need something else so I can get free ship. This means that I will not be able to use my Tablet GPS system in my vehicle until I work up another order.
customer_reviews.author: securtekman

customer_reviews.title: Stabile and flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is the second holder that I have purchased. Gave one as a gift. The mount remains firmly in the cup holder but it is easy to remove for use in another vehicle. This is strong enough to hold an iPad. If the cup holder is to the right of your gear shift it will work best. If your cup holder is behind the gear shift it might not be as accessible.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMia

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised, a little wobbly but solid otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to put my iPad next to me while I did a cross country road trip. It fit in the cup holder fine however when I put my iPad in it, it started wobbling while driving. it wasn’t a huge deal but it was a little annoying after a while. If you need to put a tablet next to you for some reason I would recommend you give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Fosbenner

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Keeps phone close and handy while keeping eyes on the road.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for wife (Who is very picky). At first she was doubtful she would use it. She doesn't trust the navigation that comes with most factory supplied cars and trusts Google Maps. She would place the phone on the cup holder and pick it up when looking for directions. Once I installed it in her car and angled it for her use, she was sold after a couple of trips and now uses it all the time. Really worth it if you use your Google Maps consistently on your phone for travel. Also allows eyes to be kept on the road as phone is angled next to dash system.
customer_reviews.author: TimA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This mount is incredible. I was skeptical about a cup holder mount but it is very sturdy. It does in fact extend to the full length as stated in the description. In the back of the tablet and phone mount there is button you press to further extended the length of the holder. I am debating getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Raymundo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Cup mount holder
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product well made. Does what it says it does. I would have liked the tabs that hold the device to be a bit longer. I am using it to hold a garmin gps and a bit more tab length would have been better for this application because the garmin is a bit "fatter/thicker" than a smartphone or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Mckown

customer_reviews.title: Great holder.
customer_reviews.text: I installed the holder in my 2008 Chevy Avalanche. The holder is very sturdy. I have not tried my iPad on the holder yet. The holder hold my iPhone in place without any problems. I’m able to see any notifications I receive easily. Important to note that I didn’t have to use the cellphone adapter. I’m using the iPad holder which I think is better suited for the iPad and iPhone. I previously purchased a holder that plugged into the cigarette lighter. That holder was crap.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Ok but a little flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed overall, when installing the tapered cup mount causes it to want to rock a little in the cup holder. The biggest problem for me is the way the vertical mount rocks/moves around so easily. The concept is good but the mechanism has too much movement allowing the entire arm to shake when driving.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Huntsman

customer_reviews.title: love this, and wonder how I lived without it ...
customer_reviews.text: love this, and wonder how I lived without it for so long. 0ne thing to definitely know. Don't even waste time putting the cell phone holder on the device. Took me and my husband an hour to wrench the ????blasted thing off before just putting the tablet one on. It can work with both devices and you'll save yourself MUCH AGGRAVATION. I saw the reviews indicating that getting these off is easy - so happy for those folks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy iphone or ipad Holder!!
customer_reviews.text: At first i didn't think it fit my i phone 7 plus but discovered it was expandable. Next I discovered how to tighten it into the cup holder to make it sturdy. I wish I would have found this product a long time ago because its is used every day in my car and/or truck. I don't have to look down anymore since it is up at eye level and can take a quick glance at the gps or weather map on my device. Made very well and very sturdy. I would buy this for a gift for a friend....I love, love, love, mine!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C. Louque

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Item is adjustable enough to fit many vehicles. We use it to hold a Tablet (horizontally) in a Ford F-150, which has a very 'high up' cup-holder. The 'tightening collar' must be very tight, but once well tightened, it holds into the cup-holder well. John 3:16
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: Works great in my VW Passat German wagen with AT.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in cup-holder of my cherished 2005 Passat TDI wagon with auto transmission. The best cradle I have seen so far and is very sturdy with my Note 4 or my Acer 8" tablet and I use the tablet holder for both. I don't think this item would be a good option for the Passat or Golf if there was a manual trans as the stick-shift would most likely be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Porschenutt

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if it allowed for verticle or height adjustment
customer_reviews.text: This item fit the need I purchased it for. The cell phone holder works well. With the adjustable round base expanded enough to fit in my cup holder, it is stable enough to use the touch screen. It is close enough to the USB power port in my truck to be able to charge my phone during use. It would be nice if it allowed for verticle or height adjustment. Although I believe this item could be improved, I’m happy with my purchase and am considering buying another one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gore

customer_reviews.title: great for an iPad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an Ipad 2. It does actually fit it and holds it securely. The expanders on the cupholder part are at the top edge so if your car's cupholder is fairly wide at eh bottom then it will wiggle side to side in hard turns. This can be remedied by wedging some paper or cardboard around the bottom of the cupholder mount. It is of no fault of the mount but simply the many differences in cars. The mount is plastic but seems quite sturdy. I am using it to hold the ipad vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Lenwood

customer_reviews.title: This mount works great in my F150 for iPad Pro.
customer_reviews.text: This mount works great in my F150 for using my iPad Pro. I set it in the center cup holders for the kids in the backseat. Well built and pretty strong. It is easy to turn, with firm clicks to keep it from spinning around loosely. Keeps the iPad right where you set it, no bouncing or anything. The kids love it. I plan on using it for my road trip from Savannah to Southern Mississippi.
customer_reviews.author: Willr

customer_reviews.title: Holds a 10 inch tablet with no trouble
customer_reviews.text: This product worked perfectly for a long journey. It held a 10 inch tablet in a horizontal position for the entire trip without even trying to fall out of the clamps. There is enough room between the clamp fingers for the charging cord to plug in. The only problem is that if the cup holders are close to the dash, the tablet is going to obscure the dash. Probably the climate controls and the center vents. And there may be some noise from the tablet bouncing off of the dash unless the device is adjusted to avoid it. I would buy another one as a gift or for another car without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Good concept. It didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Reading countless positive reviews i ordered one, with satisfaction I would order several for Christmas gifts. Very easy to read instructions & assemble. Good concept. Didn’t work. The dealbreaker — the expanding piece that fits in the cup holder wasn’t effective. The entire apparatus, including my iPad Pro (w/o protective case) would topple over. Placing & removal my iPad was not smooth... at all. I have not returned it as the box in came in was inadvertently thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the best
customer_reviews.text: It hides in your cup holder so the cops don’t see you have a phone holder and it high enough that your not hurting yourself to look over and check the screen. Make sure your cup holder is in a good location to set this before you buy. I have a 2014 Camry and I have the perfect location for it.
customer_reviews.author: Indira Y Grullon

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This is perfectly what i needed to do LYFT. It keeps my tablet close( i cant see a tiny phone screen anymore) i got one that you attach to the floor of your car but it was too cumbersome. Your cup holder version is much better. If im not using it i can stow in my console. I get alot of comments and praises on it. In short. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Boswell

customer_reviews.title: HOLD THE PHONE!, or a Tablet..
customer_reviews.text: This item is essential for anyone who doesn't mind sacrificing a cup holder for a versatile tool like this. This appliance holds my Galaxy9+ and iPad firmly and it has a nice strong spring. Worth every penny. Yes, you can flip to landscape or portrait mode. It adjusts to any cup holder, too. Delivery was on-time and packaging was ample.
customer_reviews.author: MileHighSigns

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Thus far this has been great. I purchased it for a trip. It can hold either a phone or tablet. I use the tablet holder for both my iPhone 8 Plus in its protective case long axis or my Samsung Tablet in its protective case shorter axis. On city roads it has been stable.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Only mount I’ll use
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool.. I don't worry about it falling off but it does bug me that it wiggles. I definitely recommend if you don't mind losing a cup holder.. My thing broke and I asked for a replacement but they said no because it was past the warranty so I had to buy a new one. My new one broke and they replaced it. Idc how many times they have to replace it.. this is the only mount I’ll ever use.
customer_reviews.author: trumpsuksdik

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and few adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit well in 2018-2020 Honda Accord cupholders. Also, there are little to no adjustments...The arm of the holder also needs to lock in place better. Even when the base of the unit is fully secure in a proper sized cupholder, the tablet still bounces around some when going over small bumps on the road (I tested it out in another one of my cars). However, if you dont care about those things, and have a small cupholder, then this mount may work just fine for your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: A great product, it's sturdy, well designed, and easy to install. I insert it in a 2013, Toyota Highlander cup holder, and it stays in place and doesn't wiggle around. It holds an IPAD Air 2 wrapped with in Otter Box case, and the holder clips fit around it with room to spare. The cost is reasonable, can fold up for easy storage in the Highlander's glove box. It also has an attachment for a cell phone. I highly recommend the item.
customer_reviews.author: PAG

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 Chance of a Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for my Wife's 2005 Chevy Trailblazer. She used it for a couple weeks and quit using it because the cup holder this sits in is just in a bad location so its not very comfortable for her to use. I have a 2012 Chevy Equinox and It works perfect in the Equinox for me. Good quality item. Packaging was very good and the item seems to be constructed from quality material. I would recommend finding a friend that has one of these and trying it on your vehicle 1st before ordering, just too make sure it is a good fit for your ride. Very sturdy when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase For This Product, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a cross country road trip and it was 100% what I wanted. Had my iPad set up some of the time and the other time my cell phone and since this comes with both adapters for different size electronics it was beyond perfect. SUPER STURDY, super easy to install and change out the adaptors. Very highly recommended :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam Dax

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding the LG V60 dual screen phone or tablets
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and put together. I have the LG V60 dual screen phone and its great for that. I can see this working on tablets easy and other large phones. It be good for the samsung fold too. Hold strong too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this one... most of these things are just too cheaply made to hold up, but this one is a lot better than the others I've tried. It actually fits all of the cupholders in our vehicles, and holds up our tablets like a charm. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gu

customer_reviews.title: Fine for use in 2017 Chevy Bolt
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use in my 2017 Chevy Bolt. It is too tall and blocks the center console controls when used as shown in the product pictures. I turned it around and only lift it slightly as shown here. This puts the top of the phone just under the center console controls and works great for me. I got a 1ft cable () to plug the phone into a USB port for Apple CarPlay.
customer_reviews.author: SpecialEd

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold my iPad in my work fan. I use the iPad for GPS and invoicing. Works very well. Stable and holds strong in my 2019 chevy express van cup holder. Sits at a perfect hight. Its been about 6 months of use no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Garey C. Griffith Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea! I wish I had thought of it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new car and they don’t put navigation systems in the new cars now because phones are equipped with gps. So I purchased this cup holder for my phone and gps. I purchased the cup holder for my phone and gps. It arrived and I drove to Georgia. The cup holder kept the gps in clear view for me. I would recommend it. In fact, I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Laurette Britton

customer_reviews.title: Very good!!
customer_reviews.text: wow. I bought this item in 2014 for my job as a taxi driver then my wife used it and now my son is using it and it is still in perfect condition. if you take care of it ... the quality of this article is more than guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas polanco

customer_reviews.title: Best tool on my work vehicle hands down!!
customer_reviews.text: It's super sturdy and easy to setup! Adjustable to fit almost any size tablet/phone (which is my gps) and iPad Air2 w/ Zagg cover and easily fit's with room to spare, I drive a 2013 Chevy Express w/ 3 cupholders driving 60-150+ miles a day doing service calls and love it so far! Have to say it is more convenient than the screen in my CTS 🙄
customer_reviews.author: shawn mahone

customer_reviews.title: Superior Product for NON-GPS vehicle
customer_reviews.text: This product stayed on my wish list for a while, as I was not sure of the durabity. As More GOOD reviews came in knew it was time to try it my self. I have big cup holders in my 2004 F-150 and they fit inside the rubber part that is removable. The fit is tight and the arm does not move at all. It looks/feels like a strong build that will last with normal use. I have used it on two shot road trips and around town, I am glad I purchased the longer arm. It can articulate into just about any position you want.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Good for forward cup holders
customer_reviews.text: This works as described. I was surprised how well it held my phone. Unfortunately, the cup holders in my Kia Soul are so far back (about even with the driver's hips) that I have to take my eyes too far off the road to see the phone. (Frankly the cup holders are even awkward for holding cups.) So I think this is probably a very good product, but just not a good solution for my car.
customer_reviews.author: M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile device holder!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice holder, I prefer this type of phone holder over the window mount type because when you want to put your sun shade on the mount will not be in the way, also you can actually used this mount for an ipad as well
customer_reviews.author: Christian L

customer_reviews.title: I wish it worked because it is made very well and fits in my Nissan Maxima cup holder perfect. But
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I am a Home Health Nurse and I needed it for my job. It just doesn't fit my ipad tablet. It is too small. i have the big tablet. it says it fits up to 10.2 in....nope. I wish it worked because it is made very well and fits in my Nissan Maxima cup holder perfect. But, too small. i ordered another brand and gave this one to my hubby. The new one will be delivered tomorrow. I will review it as well. I've got my finger crossed it will hold my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it. Too high
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it. Too high, in the way. Hit it all the time when reaching. Not using it. Wouldn't recommend it for Honda center cup area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This phone and tablet holder is nice! The product quality is pretty good-hardend plastics. I live on top of a mountain and my road (dirt and BUMPY) switchbacks up and down the mountain (1 mile long) and I have not had my phone or tablet dismount from the unit. The "grips" that hold the mobile device in place are spring loaded, so it is easy to mount/amount the device. I have been using this for about 1 month and is still working 100%. I would reccomend this device holder.
customer_reviews.author: M=Mc²

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my backup camera screen(after market). I was disappointed but the specs did not say it would so it was not mfrs fault. If it had it would have still been a problem since it wasn't big enough to secure to my Honda Ridgeline front cup holder. Overall I still thought it is a good product for a cellphone and smaller diameter cup holder
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stability
customer_reviews.text: I'm always worried about quality when I order phone products off line. This however is top notch and is very secure in the cup holder. It is a perfect height in my Ram 1500.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. This thing is actually very usable and practical. I use it everyday. Easy to install. Fits anycup holder. I take mine to and from my work truck and personal trucks each day. Never fails.
customer_reviews.author: Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it! Works perfectly with my Camry's cup holder. - does not block the dashboard view, AC nor CD slots. No magnets needed. I've been using a tall slim cup before but it was unstable. Now I am so happy that I found this Ikross cup mount , a perfect fit for my iPhone. I haven't tried using the Ipad holder yet. This gadget is so easy to mount and adjust the height and tightness for secure fit. This is what I've been looking for and will purchase another one for my second Camry.
customer_reviews.author: Pogi  S.

customer_reviews.title: Really well made.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in use for a few months and really like it. The versatility to change from phone to tablet holder it great, but I do wish it had some more options for positioning it. It's tall and with only one point of articulation it can be in the way sometimes. I've had numerous people ask where to buy one after seeing mine. Also the part that clamps the phone or tablet in is very easy to use and holds it very securely.
customer_reviews.author: brian lake

customer_reviews.title: Too much vibration
customer_reviews.text: Tried kindle fire, vibrates badly. Next used Motorola smart phone. Vibrates. Finally used my Garmin gps. Still vibrates considerably but better than some other offerings. Wish they could stabilize it better. Used in Lincoln mkx.
customer_reviews.author: James English

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well designed holder with strong plastic and a solid feel. The adjustable arms use interlocking teeth similar to gears instead of friction to hold them in position. This is a good design that keeps the arm adjustment from sliding under the weight of a tablet. Make sure to loosen the adjustment knob enough to disengage the teeth before attempting to adjust the arm angle. The arm will not move without completely disengaging the teeth but will move freely once the teeth are disengaged.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Cup holders are not for cups!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I can mount my Galaxy Tab in an accessible, yet non-distracting location and run Torque to manage my cars performance!! It's sturdy, easy to setup, and doesn't vibrate while driving. Time will tell on its durability, but from where I stand, that's not going to be a problem!
customer_reviews.author: Shuura

customer_reviews.title: Does what it states it does. Quality built.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product for those in the car quite a bit. These types of products are often poorly built and flimsy. Not the case here. Fits snugly into car's cup holder. Only thing would like to see is more flexibility in the outermost joint/connection (the one connected to the clamp that secures the device). To be fair, that wasn't promoted, but that would make for the 5th star.
customer_reviews.author: TRL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy or Flexible
customer_reviews.text: I notice that some describe it as sturdy and others as flexible but I say it is a nice combination of both that makes this device dependable. I noticed that a bump with an elbow or tricep will cause the device to flex slightly along the shaft and at the built in flex point at the bottom of the shaft where it rotates. All of this flexing allows the device to survive minor bumps without bruising or heaven forbid snapping. The unit also provides plenty of flexibility of positioning my Nexus 7 so it is easily viewable and chargeable. I will follow up with my experiences for the longevity of the product in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: whatever

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: This items worked perfectly for me. I used it in a Lexus 350s. I also use the holder meant for the tablet and use it to hold my phone. This allows me to mount the phone with the holders are the top and bottom. The bottom has an opening for a power cord so my phone continues to charge while I am driving. This mount allows me to use the Waze app as I am driving easily. I would recommend this item to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Eggo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this is my Chevy Colorado. A little awkward to store, but otherwise very useful on a road trip. Puts the tablet at a very good spot for hand/eyes.
customer_reviews.author: biscuit baseball

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flexibility and functionality
customer_reviews.text: The product comes with a small and large device holder, giving flexibility to hold a Phone or Tablet. Even the large holder will securely hold a phone. The base was a little smaller than my cup holder, but the foam ring helps it set in securely. It took a few tries to figure out the best way to use the foam ring. The Unit does not appear to have an adjustable height and it might be a little to high for some conditions. Overall, an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: DeanB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my ipad mini in a Ford Expedition Kingsman car.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mount for my ipad, as it has much more storage capacity than my phone, and I also use it with the Waze app. when driving to parts unknown. I was really pleased with the durability of the product and the ease in which it can mount an ipad (or iphone) and that it fitted into my cup holder really snugly, with a little adjustment. It comes with a phone attachment and a strip of EVA foam, in case you have extra wide cup holders. I was very pleased with this product, and recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Fit great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for have it now for a while and still great using this stand for work I'm a driver and we using it for Samsung Tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Will Glueck

customer_reviews.title: difficult to change gears with this mount
customer_reviews.text: it is just OK , to have this in the car for tablet holding , it all depends on your car interior and cups and gear location .. i have NIssan Rogue , it is obstructing when you want to use gear. if the can add mobility to the base it would b 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad M

customer_reviews.title: Solid build and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in my 2017 Lexus RX350. Solid build and easy to set up. I use the tablet attachment to hold my iPhone 7plus. I would buy this again without hesitation. Has not loosened itself in over two weeks of use and I don't think it will. Great product that I recommended to friends.
customer_reviews.author: pete v

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for our road trips with our kids. Ive had thia for a few months and it has held up great. My kids have dropped it, sat on it, and played with the adjustable pieces. Holds the kids tablet with its case on and hold the phones with the cases also.
customer_reviews.author: Zaina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, fits perfectly into the cupholder and I couldn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, fits perfectly into the cupholder and I couldn’t be happier. Before the cup mount I had a mount for the vent, not good for the phone since it constantly blows cold air here in TX. It holds my iPhone 6s Plus with case so it should be big enough for every cellphone. I didn’t use the tablet holder though..
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This tablet holder was just what I was looking for. Actually it exceeded my expectations. I find it to be sturdy enough to hold my tablet and have had no issues with loosening in the cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: craig jacobsma

customer_reviews.title: I like the ability of being able to switch between the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used the product for a few days. I like the ability of being able to switch between the two different holders. However I am only using the larger holder since my iphone 6 and iPad Air both fit in it. I would have given a 5 star except the phone/tablet holder does not fit tight to the base. It does not come off however it allows the device to shake.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Unique way of holding a cellphone that is much steadier than the air vent or cigarette lighter methods
customer_reviews.text: I have a "phablet" and could not find a sturdy holder for it until I chanced across this one. Utilizing one of the un-used drink holders on the center console of my work van. Holds the phone so it is fairly steady and easily seen from the driver's, or passenger's. seat. Seems rugged. Time will tell. At this point, I am pleased with this method of holding my cell phone in a position where I can see GPS mapping as well as who is calling.
customer_reviews.author: Allan K.

customer_reviews.title: I like the spring method in it so you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all and works as advertised. I like the spring method in it so you don't have to hit a button to release your product. You just simply slip it in and it holds in place with the tension. The only thing that I would change if anything is having the bottom supports for the tablet holder a little bigger. I have a case on my tablet as I image most would and that would help to make it more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Fishstick

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The but that expands and retracts the actual cup holder diameter slips when trying to tighten. Also the mount itself has minimal angles so it really doesn't work in any cup holder based on what is near that area of your dash the controls behind or near it will soon become inaccessible.
customer_reviews.author: J Sencott

customer_reviews.title: Great item . Really Happy .
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of having to reattaching my old holder to dash so I thought I would give this a try without having any expectations. I was really surprised how much I enjoy this. I did have to get used to having my phone near my cup holder but I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Reality Writes

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet holder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this with a Samsung Tab 4.0 (8 inch) in a Hyundai Elantra and couldn't be happier. The length of the arm puts the tablet at the perfect height so that I am not having to look too far down nor is it too high up. I mostly use it when using Google maps because the tablet gives me a larger screen. The arm fits inside the cup holder very well and once tightened it doesn't move.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy!! Fits all size cup holders. We have 3 vehicle and was able to move this to different cars with no problem. Able to hold iPhones and iPad. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Analiza Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Works great in 2008 Volvo XC90 and 2016 Acura MDX!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried virtually every conceivable cell phone holder for my 2008 Volvo XC90(vent mount, suction cup, etc.). Most all holders block vital controls or fall off due to uneven dash surfaces and/or a lack of convenient unobstructed areas. The iKross 2-in-1 cupholder mount is perfect! I use this with my Samsung Galaxy Note4 as well as my Nexus7 tablet. Both devices work flawlessly with the tablet holder(I threw out the additional smaller holder that was included.). This holder is easily removed when I want to take it with me in my wifes 2016 Acura MDX! Win,Win!
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: Modified this from original format and still only kind of like it
customer_reviews.text: Made this larger using a Dremel, and some Ram x parts. The cup part is nice but the plastic arm flexes a bit too much for my taste. I still use it, but i am not in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stupid People are Annoying

customer_reviews.title: Secure and perfect height
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use my tablet on loaner and rental cars, but it works so well I ended up using it in my own car replacing the original holder. I had it in 4 different cars and worked in all of them no matter the size of the cup holder. It is very solid and perfect height for the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy device
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Better than stuff stuck up on the windshield. The only caution I would have is to pay attention to the cupholders in which you will put this. There is a maximum size to which this will expand and the base is round. If you have odd ball shaped holders or they have little retracting spring loaded retention things this might be a bit tricky. But as far as how it works holding the phone, I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in AZ

customer_reviews.title: i'm sure this would be great.
customer_reviews.text: When the cup holder side is enlargened (is that a word) all the way... still too small for my cup holders. (my cup holders are large enough to fit a 32oz. Nalgene bottle). But, for "normal" size cup holders... i'm sure this would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce M Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for my family!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased one and I loved it! Not only ordered one for myself but also for family members. It adjusts easily in cup holders, is sturdy and I love the fact that the phone is not now perched on my dashboard. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Deborra S Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to hold my iPad Pro. Warning. It does not fit a Apple iPad Pro. Will be shipping it back. They should advertise it bold that it does not fit the Apple iPad Pro
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cup Mount Holder iKross 2-in-1 Tablet and Smartphone Adjustable Swing Cradle with Extended Cup Car Mount Holder Kit for Apple iPad iPhone Samsung Asus Tablet Smartphone - Black

Apple iPhone X, 8, 8 Plus, 7, 7 Plus, SE, 6S, 6S Plus, 6 4.7, 6 Plus, 5s,5c, 5
Samsung Galaxy S8+, S8, S7, S6, S5, A5, A3, A7, J5, J3, J7 Prime, Note 8 5

This is a universal mount, for devices not listed please check the device dimensions against the minimum and maximum width supported.
feature_bullets: 【 UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY:】iPad or tablet with screen size ranging from 7" to 10.2" [4 inch / 96mm) up to 7.5 inch (195mm) wide] or Smartphone 2 to 3.7 inch with width such as iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus, iPhone 7 / 7 Plus, iPhone 6 / 6 Plus, iPhone 5 / 5s, iPad Pro 9.7 / Pro 10.5 2017, iPad Air 2, iPad Mini 2, Samsung Galaxy S9, S8, S7 Edge, Galaxy Tab A 10.1, Tab S3 9.7 inch, ASUS ZenPad 3S 10, LG, HTC, Motorola, Nokia, Sony, Smartphone, Dell, HP, Asus, Acer, Lenovo, Nintendo Switch Tablet Phablet

【 OPTIMAL MOUNTING SOLUTION:】 Easily and safely access your smartphone or tablet such as 2017 New Amazon Kindle Fire 7 / Fire HD 8, 2016 Fire HD 7 / HDX 7, Kindle Fire HD 10 Tablet 10.1" 7th Generation while operating a vehicle. Secure mount to most vehicle drinks beverage cup holder.

【 EASY INSTALLATION: 】 Expandable base fits most automobiles, recreational vehicles, Car, SUV, trucks and other vehicles with standard size round cup holders. Tool-less and simple installation/removal in seconds.
【 ADJUST & ROTATE:】 360 degree swivel ball joint enables ideal and proper viewing angle.

【 SAFE & SECURE: 】 Designed to keep device steady and secure during car rides. Solid construction for minimize road vibration and a 10 inch swing arm for stabilized viewing. Perfect for Uber, Lyft, Truck, Car Pool or long distance navigation drivers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,083 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
